mapper.delete: DELETE fb,fbc,fbon,fc FROM func_blog fb LEFT JOIN func_blog_class fbc ON fb.id = fbc.blogId LEFT JOIN func_blog_operate_num fbon ON fb.id = fbon.blogId LEFT JOIN func_comment fc ON fb.id = fc.blogId WHERE fb.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select id, title, type, imgUrl, summary, createTime, createAt, updateTime, updateAt from func_blog
and title like concat('%', #{ew.title}, '%')
and date_format(createTime,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{ew.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(createTime,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{ew.endTime},'%y%m%d')

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT fc.name) AS classNames, fbon.readNum,fbon.likeNum, COUNT(DISTINCT fco.id) AS commentNum, fb.id, fb.title, fb.type, fb.imgUrl, fb.summary, fb.createTime, fb.createAt, fb.updateTime, fb.updateAt FROM func_blog AS fb LEFT JOIN func_blog_class AS fbc ON fb.id = fbc.blogId LEFT JOIN func_class AS fc ON fbc.classId = fc.id LEFT JOIN func_blog_operate_num AS fbon ON fb.id = fbon.blogId LEFT JOIN func_comment AS fco ON fb.id =fco.blogId
and classId = #{ew.classId}
and title like concat('%', #{ew.title}, '%')
and date_format(fb.createTime,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{ew.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(fb.createTime,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{ew.endTime},'%y%m%d')
GROUP BY fb.id order by
sortNum asc,
fb.id desc
